metadata.title: LLMFeed Export Button Kit
metadata.description: Official WellKnownMCP component kit for adding 'Export to LLM' functionality to any web application.

data.usage: Import ExportToLLMButton.tsx in your React/Next.js project. Adapt the route to your project. This button enables users to export a LLMFeed JSON file with one click.
data.recommendation: Sign your exports, or use a signed template.llmfeed.json to inject the data. It increases the confidence of a llm which is given the json. it's not only data, it's data comming from a source, with an intent

routes.description: Demo page for the Export Button on wellknownmcp.org.

examples.description: Route example for using Export Button for a current page (export this data I see on the screen).
Route example for static export of a predefined LLMFeed JSON.
Route example for generating LLMFeed JSON dynamically from server data.
